I created space pobe using Rover-skycrane and my Jool V rocket which is my my design + procedural fairing mode

https://docs.google.com/file/d/0Bx2uGwZ4w808ZTZRUWZsa2lWSU0/edit?usp=sharing

I created it some time ago, but when i tried to launch it cannot because navball don't work as it should. In previous update i haven't this problem.

Hrm, can't look at what you're trying to share/show up there, but I guess main thing to check is that your probe is the right way up, or you're not trying to control from a laterally aligned probe which is good for driving at the destination, but not so good for flight
Right click whichever control pod is facing up and choose control from here

Note that if you use mechjeb its controller is also an probe core and might give error if the antenna on the controller don't point upward. simply set controll from here to any forward facing probe cores or pods solves thos
